tuesday.title: Tandoori
tuesday.description: It is TANDOORI TUESDAY! üî• Enjoy any of our Tandoori meals made in our authentic tandoor oven! We serve Tandoori Kebab, Tandoori Tikka, Tandoori Wings, Tandoori Chicken, Afghani Chicken, Chicken Malai Tikka, Hriyali Chicken Tikka, Malai Paneer Tikka and Haryali Paneer Tikka. Regular $14.95 on for $12.95. To sum things up, here is what a tandoor oven is: üî• It is a traditional cooking pot made out of clay. üî• Traditional Tandoor ovens use charcoal or firewood. üî• Traditional dishes are cooked in over 400 degrees Celsius. Feel like grabbing your Tandoori platter right now? Visit us on Tandoori Tuesdays for authentic Indian tandoori dishes.

At Monsson, you get all variations from the Indian subcontinent, from Pakistan to Bangladesh, Afghanistan to India. Give us a call every Friday for our Veg or Chicken Biryani at a discounted special price of $13.95! Time to have your favourite one this Friday!
